definition: dark road/criminal ways/the underworld/see also 白道[bai2 dao4]
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Don't go there, otherwise you will get knife.
sentences.chinese: 不要走黑道，否则会挨刀。

sentences.english: At the same time police also suspects Zhang Quanzhong again effectiveness black path.
sentences.chinese: 同时警方也怀疑张全忠再次效力黑道。

sentences.english: Some people still pretend to be Hei Daolai gally me.
sentences.chinese: 有些人还冒充黑道来恐吓我。

sentences.english: Want to brag to your friends about how fast you were cruising down the double black diamond?
sentences.chinese: 想跟朋友夸耀自己在双黑道上滑的特别快？

sentences.english: You'll look like a little mobster.
sentences.chinese: 你会看起来像一名小黑道。

sentences.english: Xiaoyan does not like black way of sortie of her elder brother very much all the time.
sentences.chinese: 小燕一直很不喜欢她哥哥涉足黑道。
你会看起来像一名小黑道。

sentences.english: I will probably catch up and watch the final season of The Sopranos.
sentences.chinese: 我可能会补看一些，会看《黑道家族》的最后一季。

definition: bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
triad, Chinese crime gang/triad society, anti-Manchu secret society in Qing-dynasty China
lunar orbit/legitimate/righteous/see also 黑道[hei1 dao4]
princelings, descendants of senior communist officials (PRC)
(of a villain) to do the dirty on another villain
place in Hubei, the starting point for a major rebellion at the end of Western Han/also pr. [Lu:4 lin2]
